name: Geometry Switch Ball
description:
Take a journey through the beauty surreal, simplistic and colorful worlds that is Parallels. What seems like an easy shiva journey in the beginning, is destined to become fraught with danger.

Avoid Colored objects, ceilings, platforms on the move and shadowed shapes that will follow you to your destruction. With simple one tap controls, you’ll need fast reactions, cunning timing to reach the safety of the Parallel checkpoints.

Slide your way through Ice Kingdom, Fire Kingdom, Candy Kingdom, the Forbidden Dungeon, and the Mystery Mountains to outrun a relentless avalanche!

Parallels Features:

• Over 30 Checkpoints to reach
• Over 80 beautifuls levels
• Block Vs Balls Vs Cercles Vs Rect Vs Lines And more.
• Insane real-time physics
• Simple One-Touch Controls
• Mutli Characters Gameplay
• Puzzles, action and more
• Rich scenes: massif, cosmos, forest, snowfield, inferno
• A challenge to speed and reflex
• Game Center Leaderboards
• The floor is Lava mode added
